definition: (of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear

sentences.english: God comes to the hungry in the form of food.
sentences.chinese: 在饥饿的人面前，神示现为食物。

sentences.english: The suffering, emptiness, and impermanence of the world manifest the truth.
sentences.chinese: 世有苦空无常，故有真理示现。

sentences.english: The “secret account” gives us a very different Judas.
sentences.chinese: “秘辛”却为我们示现了一个与此完全不同的犹大。

sentences.english: Summer brook, autumn valley, spring flower, and winter snow are manifestations of truth.
sentences.chinese: 夏涧秋谷，春花冬雪，无非是真理的示现。

sentences.english: What is their content and type?
